form.label: Stamus Host Timeline
form.description: Combined timeline of Declarations of Compromise and Host Insights data for a given host

search.query: | snlinearsearch filter="ip=$src$" | spath | append [ search `stamus_index` event_type="stamus" sourcetype="suricata:stamus" stamus.asset="$src$" |rename stamus.asset AS ip stamus.threat_name as type stamus.kill_chain as value | eval event_type="threat" | stats min(timestamp) as timestamp by ip, type, event_type, value] | sort timestamp | table timestamp ip event_type type value
